configuration.stem: Summarize the evidence you have gathered to support your claim and explain your reasoning.
configuration.recommended answer: this is optional recommended answer text
configuration.feedbackText:
• Provide a claim about how different structures in the cow’s and worm’s digestive systems perform the same basic function.
• Identify the basic function of the digestive system.
• Compare the structures and functions and the two different digestive systems, and relate these differences to differences in diets.
